Time The cast of The Sandlot reunited on the baseball diamond Thursday, 25 years after the iconic coming - of - age movie landed in theaters, and the kids are all grown up. The gang got back together on the Today Show for a reunion celebrating the milestone anniversary of the classic film about a group of kids spending the summer playing baseball and getting into mischief.
